name: Is this a Thief?
description:
A thief game made with Godot

Controls

W A S D - Movement

Left click - Interact

Space - Toggle night vision

E - Toggle disguise

Resources of the game Textures

UI pack - Made by Kenney

Textures (Top Down Shooter) - Made by Kenney

Sounds Effects

Stealth Music - Made by Lisboa

Sounds Effects - Made by Kenney
